name: Grace Food Bank
description: Countless Lives Depend Grace Food Bank. Countless lives depend on Grace Food Bank. Donate to support their cause is to see many more food banks all over the nation

name: Mission Smile Program
description: SAVE LIVES, GIVE SMILES. Your Support Can Save A Child Today A Single, Solvable Problem: Cleft Lip and Palate Many children around the world are living with untreated clefts.

name: Disability Elimination Program
description: Are you new to the Disability Elimination Program? Fear not, we have you sorted! Our step-by-step process will help you understand the work of Real Happiness Of Life Foundation in detail.

name: Home For Homeless Program
description: Home For Homeless in Bhiwandi to Care to the homeless as well as those suffering from mental health issues in and around Mumbai. Every being deserves a peaceful life.

name: Mission Education Program
description: Education changes everything Education is the driver for sustainable change and So They Can believe that empowering communities through a quality education.

name: Maternal & Child Health Program
description: A continuum of care RMNCH+A (Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn, Child and Adolescent Health) means working with women and children from birth to adulthood

name: Women Empowerment Program
description: Helping women find their voice is deeply empowering and has a ripple effect on families and society.Real Happiness Of Life

name: Animal Welfare Program
description: Help us look after our permanent family members by sponsoring their daily requirements.This includes food, medication, treatments, and trained caretakers.
